name: Ian B.
text: Best pizza in Cheyenne hands down! I remember when they opened in Colorado back in the late 80s I believe- They are a bit more pricey than the other chains but well worth it. Here‚Äôs a little interesting tidbit of knowledge. Do you know that the columbine massacre was funded by blackjack pizza?just a bit of trivia .

name: Greg Kirk
text: Outstanding pizza. Fast service and reasonably priced.

name: Toni Briggs
text: Blackjack Pizza has been my families go to üçï for years! I've never gotten a pizza from them that wasn't hot and delicious. The employees are also so friendly and helpful. If you haven't tried blackjack Pizza you should definitely give it a try. The prices are good and the pizza is delicious!

text: We live in Fox Run and you have been delivering to us for every Friday night for years. We call tonight and they state ‚Äú you live too far out we can not deliver to you any more‚Äù We will now be taking our service else where. We tipped 15-20 ‚Ä¶More

name: Chubby McPhattz
text: Went to the store on Lincoln.  Ordered the Supreme square pie.  Nice woman working the counter told me how I could save a few bucks by ordering the preset pie.  Done in around 12 mins.  Went straight home and enjoyed a piping hot, tasty pizza.  Crust was crisp and flavorful.  Toppings were plentiful.  Will be going back.

name: Rachel P.
text: I placed an online order for 5:45 PM. 5:45 comes and goes, I wait until 6 to call. That's when I'm told the driver hasn't even left yet. They tell me it'll be another 15 minutes until he arrives. 15 minutes pass, I call again. They tell me ‚Ä¶More
